name: Deep into the space
description:
Description

Your journey to another star system was interrupted. It turns out that initial navigation calculations were wrong. Before you is vast asteroid field. It is to late to come back, so you need to fly throu it. Or at least try to.

Controls

WASD / left analog - movement

Tools Used

Unity

Audacity

Blender

Musescore

Resources Used

https://www.1001freefonts.com/neuropol.font

Credits

@vodzik - 3D Modelling, Scripting, Anything

@gucio-miszcz - Scripting, Drinking, Support

@zniwa - Music (https://www.facebook.com/zespolzniwa)

Known issues

-HTML5 - Performance drop after first loading of new game scene. After couple of seconds it is stabilizing.

(fixed) -HTML5 - Every user is automaticaly loged as “Anon” so it will be only one record on leaderboard foll all players in html version.

(fixed) -ALL - Music looping is not seamless.

Path Notes 1.1:

-Music loop is now seamless

-Fix problem with leaderboard
